sec.title: Media & STM Partners
sec.p: Bentham Science Publishers, STM Bio-medical and Medical publishers of excellence, collaborates in marketing exchanges with conference organizers, scientific societies, subscriptions agents and other parties involved in STM publishing and the Medical and Bio-medical world.
Click here to visit our Media and STM partners web page.

sec.title: Conference Exchanges
sec.p: Bentham Science Publishers displays its titles or attends over 200 conferences worldwide.
This conference site is further highlighted in many of our adverts placed in major journals world wide, alerting a broad audience to your conference.

Our promotional CD, containing both Free sample copies and information, also contains a conference section. This CD is distributed at all major conferences and furthermore used for other Bentham promotional activities.
We would be happy to include your conference in our CD and website as part of a marketing exchange.
Click here to visit our conference web page.

sec.title: Contact us:
sec.p: For details on such exchanges, please contact us directly at marketing@benthamscience.org, providing the name and date of the conference and the number of expected delegates.
